response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This remarkable item holds significant value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. I understand that its true worth might be subjective, but I believe it is invaluable to those who appreciate its quality and craftsmanship.

Given the exceptional nature of this product, I am extending an offer to you to purchase it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents a substantial discount compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for someone who recognizes its unique qualities and potential impact.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you choose to accept, I assure you that you will not only receive a high-quality product but also gain access to a level of service and support that is unparalleled in our industry. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Thank you for considering this opportunity. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
